instructions.ar: ادخل Rotary Name واسلك المخرج الثانية باتجاه Destination 1
instructions.da: Kør ind i Rotary Name og tag anden afkørsel mod Destination 1
instructions.de: In den Kreisverkehr fahren und zweite Ausfahrt nehmen Richtung Destination 1
instructions.en: Enter Rotary Name and take the 2nd exit towards Destination 1
instructions.eo: Enveturu Rotary Name kaj sekve al 2. elveturejo direkte al Destination 1
instructions.es: Entra en Rotary Name y coge la 2ª salida hacia Destination 1
instructions.es-ES: En Rotary Name toma la 2ª salida hacia Destination 1
instructions.fi: Aja liikenneympyrään Rotary Name ja valitse 2. erkanemiskaista suuntana Destination 1
instructions.fr: Prendre le rond-point de Rotary Name, puis la seconde sortie en direction de Destination 1
instructions.he: היכנס לRotary Name וצא ביציאה השניה לכיוון Destination 1
instructions.hu: Hajtson be a Rotary Name körforgalomba, majd hajtson ki a 2. kijáraton a Destination 1 irányába
instructions.id: Masuk Rotary Name dan ambil jalan keluar 2 menuju Destination 1
instructions.it: Immèttitì in Rotary Name e prendi la 2ª uscita verso Destination 1
instructions.ja: Rotary Nameの2 つ目の番出口からDestination 1へ向かう
instructions.ko: Rotary Name로 진입해서 두번째번 출구로 나가 Destination 1로 가세요.
instructions.my: Rotary Nameဝင်ပြီးဒုတိယကိုယူကာDestination 1ဆီသို့ထွက်ပါ
instructions.nl: Ga het knooppunt Rotary Name op en neem afslag 2e richting Destination 1
instructions.no: Kjør inn i Rotary Name og ta 2. avkjørsel mot Destination 1
instructions.pl: Wjedź na Rotary Name i wyjedź 2. zjazdem w kierunku Destination 1
instructions.pt-BR: Entre em Rotary Name e saia na 2º saída sentido Destination 1
instructions.pt-PT: Entre emRotary Name e saia na saída 2º em direção a Destination 1
instructions.ro: Intrați în Rotary Name și urmați a doua ieșire spre Destination 1
instructions.ru: На Rotary Name сверните на второй съезд в направлении Destination 1
instructions.sl: Zapeljite v Rotary Name in izberite 2.. izvoz v smeri proti Destination 1
instructions.sv: I Rotary Name, ta 2:a avfarten mot Destination 1
instructions.tr: Rotary Name dönel kavşağa gir ve Destination 1 istikametindeki ikinci numaralı çıkışa gir
instructions.uk: Рухайтесь по Rotary Name та поверніть у 2й з'їзд в напрямку Destination 1
instructions.vi: Đi vào Rotary Name và ra tại đường thứ 2 về Destination 1
instructions.yo: Tẹ Rotary Name ki o si ya 2nd jade si ọna Destination 1
instructions.zh-Hans: 进入Rotary Name环岛后从第二出口驶出，前往Destination 1
